data.title: Joe Slatter
data.meta_description: See their most recent and featured creations with Concepts App.
data.text:
Joe Slatter is an industrial designer and the founder of the design company Studio Enemy. His designs — influenced by his passions for industrial design, art and making — have been awarded the Cambridge Consultants’ Excellence in Breakthrough Design Award, as well as being shortlisted for the BraunPrize and the iF Design Talent Award.
